sentences.en: A thirteen year old girl is being treated after breathing in smoke.
sentences.cn: 一名13岁的小姑娘因吸入浓烟正在接受治疗。

sentences.en: Brenner was breathing hard, his face contorted with pain.
sentences.cn: 勃伦纳艰难地呼吸着，面部因为痛苦而变得扭曲。

sentences.en: Firms need a breathing space if they are to recover.
sentences.cn: 这些公司需要短暂休整才能恢复元气。

sentences.en: He looked at Ellen, breathing evenly in her sleep.
sentences.cn: 他看着埃伦，她正呼吸均匀地睡着。

sentences.en: He stood in the doorway, listening to her quiet, regular breathing.
sentences.cn: 他站在走道里，听着她那沉静而规律的呼吸声。

sentences.en: He was going red in the face and breathing with difficulty.
sentences.cn: 他涨红了脸，费力地喘着气。

sentences.en: His breathing was deep and regular.
I stood there breathing in the fresh Norwegian air.
sentences.cn: 我站在那儿呼吸着挪威新鲜的空气。

sentences.en: Most farmers have bank managers breathing down their necks.
sentences.cn: 大部分农场主的一举一动都受到银行经理们的密切关注。

sentences.en: Relax as much as possible and keep breathing steadily.
sentences.cn: 尽量放松，保持平稳呼吸。

sentences.en: She began to hear her own taut, shallow breathing.
sentences.cn: 她开始听见自己急促、微弱的呼吸。

sentences.en: She could hear his ragged breathing, as if he had been running.
sentences.cn: 她能听到他不均匀的呼吸声，似乎他是跑着过来的。

sentences.en: She could hear the constant rhythm of his breathing.
sentences.cn: 她能听见他均匀而有节奏的呼吸。

sentences.en: The bird had trouble breathing and was discharging blood from the nostrils.
sentences.cn: 那只鸟呼吸困难，并且鼻孔里还在流血。

sentences.en: We were breathing really fast, and using the air up quickly.
sentences.cn: 当时我们呼吸非常急促，很快就要把空气用完了。

sentences.en: When I picked up the phone, all I heard was heavy breathing (=  loud breathing  ) .
sentences.cn: 我拿起电话，只听到粗重的呼吸声。

sentences.en: You notice that your breathing has speeded up a bit.
sentences.cn: 你注意到自己的呼吸加快了一些。

words.tran_cn: 喘不过气来的；停止呼吸的
呼吸，气息；一口气，（呼吸的）一次；瞬间，瞬息；微风；迹象；无声音，气音
呼吸者；呼吸的东西；剧烈的运动；短时间的休息
呼吸（breath的过去式和过去分词）
呼吸；低语；松口气；（风）轻拂
呼吸；使喘息；流露；低声说

phrases.tran_cn: 呼吸器；呼吸机；呼吸面具；通气设备
喘气的机会；休息时间或空间

trans.tran_cn: 呼吸，（空气、花香等的）飘动，微风，短暂休息
trans.tran_en: the process of breathing air in and out

trans.tran_cn: 呼吸( breathe的现在分词 )，轻声说话，低语，低声说
